items.content:
Vaultbreakers Playtest Giveaway!

Vaultbreakers is an upcoming top-down, high-stakes adventure ARPG. Engage in combat that rewards preparation, skill, and knowledge. Build up your Haven from rubble to fortress, learn your enemies, and tailor your playstyle on an epic journey in PvE or PvPvE. This Steam key gives you access to the upcoming Playtest on December 4th and all the following playtests until launch.
items.redemptionInstructions:
1. Copy your key from this page, or find it again in My Loot.
  2. Open your Steam client, click "Games" in the top menu and choose "Activate a Product on Steam…"
  3. Follow the on-screen instructions and insert your key.
  4. GGs and have fun!
items.title: Vaultbreakers Playtest Key Giveaway

items.content:
Beat Cop Game Key Giveaway

A retro, pixel art style adventure in New York, inspired by ’80s cop shows. You are Jack Kelly and you’ve been framed for murder. Now as a regular beat cop you have to find out, who did that. Expect thick crime story, a lot of black humour and all the other things you can find on the streets of Brooklyn.
items.redemptionInstructions:
1. Copy your key from this page, or find it again in My Loot.
  2. Open your Steam client, click "Games" in the top menu and choose "Activate a Product on Steam…"
  3. Follow the on-screen instructions and insert your key.
  4. GGs and have fun!
items.title: Beat Cop Game Key Giveaway

items.content:
Are you ready for the first Yoyovania?! In this 2D top-down adventure you'll explore a sprawling urban landscape, reinterpreting your surroundings through your mastery of yoyo tricks. Navigate the city's many districts, fight rival crime bosses, and regain the influence of the Pipistrello family!

Get your Pipistrello and the Cursed Yoyo game key now!
items.redemptionInstructions:
1. Copy your key from this page, or find it again in My Loot.
  2. Open your Steam client, click "Games" in the top menu and choose "Activate a Product on Steam…"
  3. Follow the on-screen instructions and insert your key.
  4. GGs and have fun!
items.title: Pipistrello and the Cursed Yoyo Giveaway

items.content:
World of Tanks Holiday Ops Giveaway

Celebrate Holiday Ops 2026 (until January 12, 2026 05:59:59 UTC), the biggest World of Tanks PC event of the year, with exclusive in-game rewards. This season, Benedict Cumberbatch joins the event as the official Holiday Ambassador, bringing new Assignments, special decorations, unique customizations, and bonuses to your battles. Your Bonus Code/Key includes:
  • 400 Rock Crystals
  • 400 Pure Emeralds
  • 400 Warm Amber
  • 400 Meteoric Iron
    • Use these to boost your Holiday Ops progression and unlock rewards faster.
  • 5 Gift Terminal Tokens for Holiday Ops 2026
  • Caliban - Tier VIII Premium Tank (5-Day Rental) Includes Garage Slot and Trained Crew.
Gear up for the holidays, accelerate your progress, and make the most of one of World of Tanks’ biggest seasonal events! Offer and redemption of Bonus Code/Key available until January 11, 2026 (23:59:59 UTC) or until all bonus codes/keys are exhausted, whichever occurs first. The participation in this Giveaway is not open to individuals, residing in China. Bonus Codes/Keys are single-use and limited to one per game account.
items.redemptionInstructions:
1. Copy your bonus code/key from this page, or find it again in My Loot.
  2. Go to the Official World of Tanks Website and create an account or log in to your existing account.
  3. Click your username in the upper-right corner of the screen and select Activate Wargaming Code from the dropdown menu.
  4. In the window that opens, enter your bonus code in the special field, and then click Redeem Code.
  5. Wait until the bonus code/key is processed (it may take some time). You should see your reward the next time you log in to World of Tanks.
  6. For further redemption instructions visit the World of Tanks redemption guide.
  7. GGs and have fun!
items.title: World of Tanks Holiday Ops Giveaway

items.content:
In Call of Duty®: Black Ops 7, Treyarch and Raven Software are bringing players the most mind-bending Black Ops ever across an innovative Co-Op Campaign, an electrifying Multiplayer experience, and the legendary Round-Based Zombies mode.

Grab your 15 minute double-level XP boost now to get ahead of your fellow combatants!
items.redemptionInstructions:
1. Copy your key from this page, or find it again in My Loot.
  2. Click the link to head to Call of Duty's Official Game Page
  3. Log into your Activision account and follow the on-screen redemption instructions!
  4. GL HF!
items.title: Call of Duty®: Black Ops 7 Giveaway - Double Level XP

items.content:
World of Warships

Naval Supplies Giveaway!

Heed the call of the seas and take the plunge into the naval arenas of World of Warships with a handy bundle of items that'll help turn the tide in your favor! Upon redeeming, all players get:
  • 1 Polygonal Gray permanent camouflage
  • 2 uncommon economic bonuses of each type
  • 1 More Signals container
New players will additionally get:
  • German Tier II Premium cruiser Emden with a Port slot and 6-skill-point Commander
  • 7 days of Warships Premium Account
  • 300 Doubloons
  • 1,500,000 Credits
  • 8 uncommon economic bonuses of each type
  • Mission: Fight 15 battles to receive on of four researchable Tier IV ships for free
items.redemptionInstructions:
1. Copy your bonus code/key from this page, or find it again in My Loot.
  2. Go to the Official World of Warships Website and input your unique code in the provided field.
  3. Create or Log into your Wargaming.net account.
  4. Start up World of Warships through the WGC launcher to receive your goodies!
  5. GGs and have fun!
items.title: World of Warships Naval Supplies Giveaway
